response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial arrangement. I am offering you the chance to purchase this unique item for $1,400,000. This price reflects the intrinsic worth and the potential it holds for you, while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your interests and budget. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 1400000}
